item.title: Pokemon TCG New Mega Lucario Ex Figure Collection Restocked At Amazon
item.content:encoded:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Amazon has the new Pokemon TCG Mega Lucario ex Figure Collection in stock for $49.69 (was $70). The Mega Evolution-themed Lucario box set launched November 7. It comes with a Lucario figure with a built-in terrain display stand, two Mega Lucario ex promo cards, and five booster packs. Amazon is also taking preorders for Phantasmal Flames' Mega Battle Deck.

  • Mega Lucario Figure
  • Etched Foil Promo Card - Mega Lucario ex
  • Oversized Promo Card - Mega Lucario ex
  • 2 Mega Evolution Booster Packs
  • 2 Destined Rivals Booster Packs
  • 1 Journey Together Booster Pack
  • Pokemon TCG Live Code

Mega Evolution - Phantasmal Flames launches this Friday, November 14. Like most Pokemon TCG releases this year, Phantasmal Flames is proving difficult to find in stock ahead of launch. As usual, prices are all over the place, too. I initially started writing this story because Amazon restocked preorders for the Mega Charizard X ex Ultra-Premium Collection and Booster Display Box, but both sold out while I was writing.

The Mega Battle Deck is still in stock for $30. If you preorder from Amazon, you'll get a Gengar ex or Diancie ex 60-card deck as well as a playmat, deck box, strategy sheet, damage counters, and a metallic coin.

With the exception of the Build & Battle Box, all of the Phantasmal Flames products listed below release November 14. The Build & Battle Box launches December 5.

  • Mega Battle Deck: Gengar or Diancie ex -- $30
  • Mega Charizard X ex Ultra-Premium Collection
  • Elite Trainer Box
  • Booster Bundle (6 Packs)
  • Pokemon TCG: Trainer's Toolkit
  • Booster Display Box
  • Booster Blister (3 Packs)
  • Booster Pack
  • Build & Battle Box

Pokemon TCG Mega Evolution

Amazon may not have Phantasmal Flame booster packs in stock when you read this, but the retailer does have multiple products in the Mega Evolution base set right now. The prices have dropped recently, too. The Mega Evolution Elite Trainer Box was selling for around $100 a few weeks ago, but now it's available for $80. You can get the Booster Bundle with six card packs for $55--five bucks lower than Amazon's price last month. Amazon also has the Booster Blister 3-Pack for $29.89. The Mega Latias ex Box was in stock recently for $41, but now it's only available via resellers.

  • Mega Evolution Elite Trainer Box -- $80 ($100)
  • Mega Evolution Booster Bundle -- $55 ($60)
  • Mega Evolution Blister Pack (3 Boosters) -- $29.89
  • Mega Evolution Latias ex Box -- $42.49 | reseller

Pokemon Trading Card Game: What's in stock?

If you're looking for more Pokemon Trading Card Game products ahead of the holidays, the list below collects all of the in-stock items at Amazon. We only included products that are sold and shipped by Amazon, and we excluded the Mega Evolution and Phantasmal Flames products mentioned above. Notable in-stock bundles and collections include the Pokemon TCG Holiday Calendar 2025 for $73 and Pokemon Battle Academy 2024 for $13.69. The popular Infernape V Box is back in stock for $65 after being sold out for months.

One notable omission from the list is Blaziken ex & Volcanion ex Premium Collection, Amazon's Holiday 2025 exclusive. It was restocked on October 19 but quickly sold out, and we haven't seen it return. You can, however, purchase Amazon's Holiday 2024 Paradox Fury Premium Collection. It ships from Amazon's UK warehouses for free.

  • Infernape V Box -- $65
  • Paradox Fury Premium Collection -- $69.71
  • Pokemon Holiday Calendar 2025 -- $73
  • Pokemon Battle Academy 2024 -- $13.69 ($25)
  • Black Volt Binder Collection -- $56 ($68)
  • Black Bolt & White Flare Poster Collection -- $38.86
  • Black Bolt & White Flare Unova Victini Illustration Collection -- $51.82
  • White Flare Elite Trainer Box -- $83
  • Prismatic Evolutions Surprise Box -- $50.36
  • Team Rocket Tin (5 Boosters) -- $42
  • Azure Legends Tin (5 Packs) -- $45
  • Black Volt / White Flare: Unova Mini Tin -- $23
  • Prismatic Evolutions Mini Tin -- $27
  • Twilight Masquerade Booster Bundle -- $70
  • Ninetales ex or Zapdos ex Deluxe Battle Deck -- $20
  • 2024 World Championships Deck -- $19
  • Tapu Koko ex or Iron Leaves ex Battle Deck -- $11.41
  • Lucario ex or Ampharos ex Battle Deck -- $22
  • Chien-Pao ex or Tinkaton ex Battle Deck -- $20.59
  • Lycanroc V or Corviknight V Battle Deck -- $11.43
